| HistoryText             = 
===Origin===
With an increasing student body, [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]] & [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]] reorganized the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]]'s educational and training program into a squad system.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #1}} The Corsairs Squad was advised by [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #2}}{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 13}}

===Academy X===
The Corsairs won second place in the Field Day Events at the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]].{{r|New X-Men: Academy X Yearbook #1}} At some point during the semester [[Dallas Gibson (Earth-616)|Specter]] switched spots with [[Mark Sheppard (Earth-616)|DJ]] on this squad.

===Members===
* [[Callie Betto (Earth-616)|Dryad]] - Callie Betto could influence plant growth. Depowered, and killed in bus bombing by [[Purifiers (Earth-616)|Purifiers]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #24}}
* [[Maxwell Jordan (Earth-616)|Quill]] - Most of Maxwell Jordan's body was covered in spiky quills. Retained his powers, but was later killed by [[William Stryker (Earth-616)|Stryker]]'s [[Purifiers (Earth-616)|Purifiers]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #27}} 
* [[Dallas Gibson (Earth-616)|Specter]] - Dallas Gibson could become a living shadow form. Depowered, and currently living with his grandfather.
* [[Stepford Cuckoos (Earth-616)|Three-in-One]] - The Stepford Cuckoos have a telepathic hive mind. Co-Field Leaders. Retained their powers and remained with the X-Men.
** [[Celeste Cuckoo (Earth-616)|Celeste Cuckoo]] 
** [[Irma Cuckoo (Earth-616)|Irma Mindee Cuckoo]]
** [[Phoebe Cuckoo (Earth-616)|Phoebe Cuckoo]]

===M-Day===
After [[Decimation|M-Day]] only 27 of 182 enrolled Xavier's students retained their powers. The Corsairs Squad was disbanded along with all the other [[X-Men Training Squads]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #20|#23}} 

| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = 
| Weapons                 = 

| Notes                   = 
* This squad was named after [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]]’ father, [[Christopher Summers (Earth-616)|Christopher Summers]] who went by the name [[Corsair]] as a member of the intergalactic adventurers known as the [[Starjammers (Earth-616)|Starjammers]].
* The squad’s colors are blue and white with grey accents.
